channel.title: Connecting a 517 client to my server
channel.description:
ok so i have my source and i downloaded abbyscape client, this client doesnt have a EGUI or GUI and in the CLIENT section it doesnt have an ip?
where should i put my ip?!!?!?

item.title: Connecting a 517 client to my server

item.description:
@landy wrote:

thanks! i use your source but the chars dont backup?

item.title: Connecting a 517 client to my server
item.dc:creator: @JohnnyWorldz517 JohnnyWorldz517
item.description:
@JohnnyWorldz517 wrote:

Loader.java

And search for:

Class68_Sub20_Sub15.ip = “127.0.0.1”;

Or set ur server ip at 127.0.0.1 hope i helped. i am not sure this works but it worked for me.

Read full topic
